# Configuration Defaults Reference

subsystem. To regenerate:

```
python tools/dump_defaults.py
```
## Planner (`planner.defaults`)
| Name | Value | Type | Category | Det. | Safety | Description |
|------|-------|------|----------|------|--------|-------------|
| `DEFAULT_MODEL` | `'gpt-5.2-codex'` | str | model | yes |  | LLM model for plan generation |
| `DEFAULT_REASONING_EFFORT` | `'medium'` | str | model | yes |  | OpenAI reasoning effort parameter |
| `DEFAULT_MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS` | `64000` | int | model |  |  | max output token budget |
| `MAX_INCOMPLETE_TOKEN_CAP` | `65000` | int | model |  |  | cap for incomplete-retry budget doubling |
| `CONNECT_TIMEOUT` | `30.0` | float | timeout |  |  | HTTP connect timeout (seconds) |
| `READ_TIMEOUT` | `60.0` | float | timeout |  |  | HTTP read timeout (seconds) |
| `WRITE_TIMEOUT` | `30.0` | float | timeout |  |  | HTTP write timeout (seconds) |
| `POOL_TIMEOUT` | `30.0` | float | timeout |  |  | connection pool timeout (seconds) |
| `MAX_TRANSPORT_RETRIES` | `3` | int | retries |  |  | HTTP-level retry count (429/502/503/504) |
| `TRANSPORT_RETRY_BASE_S` | `3.0` | float | retries |  |  | linear backoff base (delay = base * attempt) |
| `MAX_INCOMPLETE_RETRIES` | `1` | int | retries |  |  | retry count for incomplete responses |
| `POLL_INTERVAL_S` | `5.0` | float | polling |  |  | seconds between status polls |
| `POLL_DEADLINE_S` | `2400.0` | float | polling |  |  | max wait for LLM response (40 min) |
| `OPENAI_API_BASE` | `'https://api.openai.com/v1'` | str | paths |  |  | OpenAI API base URL |
| `RESPONSES_ENDPOINT` | `'https://api.openai.com/v1/responses'` | str | paths |  |  | derived responses endpoint |
| `MAX_COMPILE_ATTEMPTS` | `3` | int | retries |  |  | 1 initial + up to 2 revision retries |
| `COMPILE_HASH_HEX_LENGTH` | `16` | int | hashing | yes |  | compile hash truncation length |
| `VERIFY_SCRIPT_PATH` | `'scripts/verify.sh'` | str | paths |  |  | global verify script path (dup of factory) |
| `VERIFY_COMMAND` | `'bash scripts/verify.sh'` | str | paths |  |  | verify command string for E105 validation |
| `WO_ID_PATTERN_STR` | `'^WO-\\d{2}$'` | str | paths |  |  | WO ID regex pattern string |
| `REQUIRED_PLACEHOLDER` | `'{{PRODUCT_SPEC}}'` | str | paths |  |  | required prompt template placeholder |
| `OPTIONAL_PLACEHOLDERS` | `('{{DOCTRINE}}', '{{REPO_HINTS}}')` | tuple | paths |  |  | optional prompt placeholders |
| `PLANNER_PROMPT_FILENAME` | `'PLANNER_PROMPT.md'` | str | paths |  |  | default prompt template filename |
| `SKIP_DIRS` | `frozenset(['.eggs', '.git', '.mypy_cache', '.pytest_cache', '.tox', '.venv', '__pycache__', 'node_modules', 'venv'])` | frozenset | limits |  | yes | dirs excluded from repo file listing |
| `MAX_JSON_PAYLOAD_BYTES` | `10485760` | int | limits |  | yes | max JSON payload before parse (10 MB) |
| `SHELL_OPERATOR_TOKENS` | `frozenset(['&&', ';', '<', '<<', '>', '>>', '\|', '\|\|'])` | frozenset | limits |  | yes | banned shell operator tokens |

| Name | Value | Type | Category | Det. | Safety | Description |
